prepared_by: ADU West Coast / Ideal Designs (C. Sanchez)
description: Existing and proposed site plans plus existing garage first floor plan for new 2nd-floor ADU above existing garage at 326 Flint Ave., Long Beach. Shows lot dimensions (25' x 130'), setbacks, utility locations, new ADU footprint (475.0 sq.ft.) over existing garage (380.0 sq.ft.), new staircase (71.0 sq.ft.), new covered patio (65.0 sq.ft.), HVAC condenser on garage roof, and new electric heat pump water heater enclosure. Red APPROVED stamp (BADD326126, 10/29/25).
key_content: Lot dimensions: 25' wide x 130' deep property line
(E) Two-Car Garage: 380.0 SQ.FT.
(N) ADU: 475.0 SQ.FT. above (E) Garage
(E) Two-Story Single-Family Residence: 1,444.0 SQ.FT.
(E) Trellis Covering Patio: 219.0 SQ.FT.
(N) Covered Patio: 65.0 SQ.FT.
(N) Staircase w/ Covered Top Landing: 71.0 SQ.FT.
(N) Elect. Heat Pump W/H within framed stucco enclosure: 5.0 SQ.FT.
(E) Covered Area by Cantilever: 38.0 SQ.FT.
ADU rear setback: 4' from alley-side property line
Garage rear setback: 3'
Side setbacks: 3' S.B. (both sides)
ADU side setback: 4' ADU S.B.
Overhang setback: 3'-6" O.H. S.B. (30' MIN.)
Overhang side setback: 2'-6" O.H. S.B.
9' cantilever of 2nd floor ADU beyond garage footprint
(E) 6" sewer lateral in alley
(E) Single water meter serves both Main Home & ADU
(E) Single gas meter serves both M.H. & ADU
(E) 200 AMP electrical meter for Main Home
(N) 100 AMP electrical meter for ADU
(N) Water line to ADU (new)
(N) Gas line to ADU (new)
(N) Electric heat pump mini-split condenser on garage roof (single-zone system w/ vinyl screen)
1 HR fire rated under-eaves per detail #4 on A3.1 (within 5-ft from any P.L.)
1HR fire rated ceiling/floor assembly per detail #2 on A3.1
(E) CMU wall 6' tall on both side boundaries
(E) Garage width: 19'
Front setback (1st fl.): 26' (E), Front setback (2nd fl.): 24' (E)
Curb face to property line: 12' CFPL
30' from property line to street centerline
Alley: 10' wide, 5' setback from property line
Site note: all mechanical units require min 3-ft setback to property lines
Site note: no discharge of pollutants to storm drainage
Note: no existing street tree in public right of way
Approved: BADD326126, 10/29/25, Anthony Montez - Building Plan Check
NOT SHOWN: lot coverage percentage
NOT SHOWN: FAR (floor area ratio)
NOT SHOWN: parking count or layout
NOT SHOWN: drainage direction
NOT SHOWN: easements
NOT SHOWN: grading elevations

drawing_zones.content: (E) SITE PLAN — existing conditions at 1/8" = 1'-0". Shows lot outline, existing two-car garage (380.0 sq.ft.), driveway, two-story SFR (1,444.0 sq.ft.), trellis patio (219.0 sq.ft.), landscape, hardscape, CMU walls, planter, sidewalk, parkway, water meter. Dimension strings on right edge.

(N) SITE PLAN — proposed conditions at 1/8" = 1'-0". Shows new ADU (475.0 sq.ft.) above garage, new staircase (71.0 sq.ft.), covered patio (65.0 sq.ft.), HVAC condenser on roof, heat pump water heater enclosure (5.0 sq.ft.), new utility lines (water, gas), new 100 AMP electrical meter, setback dimensions, detail references to A3.1.
SITE PLAN LEGEND — pattern keys for ADU outline, hardscape, patio cover, landscape, roof line, floor outlines, property line. Plus fire rated under-eaves note referencing detail #4 on A3.1.
SITE NOTES — 3 numbered notes: house number visibility, pollutant discharge prohibition, mechanical unit 3-ft setback requirement.

(E) GARAGE 1ST. FL. plan at 1/4" = 1'-0". Shows existing two-car garage footprint, new ADU dashed outline above, staircase with UP arrow, electric heat pump water heater in stucco enclosure, detail bubbles B/A3.1 and A/A3.1.
1ST FLOOR PLAN LEGEND — symbols for 2nd floor ADU outline, 1HR fire rated ceiling/floor assembly (detail #2 on A3.1), new wall, existing wall to remain.
APPROVED stamp — BADD326126, dated 10/29/25, City of Long Beach Electronic Plan Check, Anthony Montez - Building Plan Check.

Title block — NEW ADU ABOVE (E) GARAGE, Main Home Address: 326 FLINT AVE., ADU Address: 326 FLINT AVE., UNIT 'A', Long Beach, CA. 90814. ADU West Coast and Ideal Designs logos. Job 25-326FLINT, drawn by C. Sanchez 07/22/2025, updated 10/08/2025.
Scale labels: (E) SITE PLAN 1/8" = 1'-0" (left) and (N) SITE PLAN 1/8" = 1'-0" (center), Flint Ave. street labels, north arrows.
PAGE A1 designation, revision block, job number 25-326FLINT.
